text: Ezɨ Pol kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “God uaghan nɨ mɨsuegham! Nɨ mati dɨpenir bɨrir kuram, me azenan aneghefe. Eghtɨ me aven an kuramɨn ganan kogham. Nɨ magh aperaghav ikiava Moses Osirizir Arazibagh gisɨn tugha na kot garɨsi. Egha nɨ na mɨsoghasa mɨgeir mɨgɨrɨgɨamɨn nɨ uabɨ Moses Osirizir Arazim gasɨghasɨsi.”(23:3) Wok Pris 19:15 kamagh mɨgei, gumazir kotiam barazim an arazir aghuimra kotɨn a damu. Pol ti mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gɨnɨghnɨgha egha kamagh mɨgei, ofa gamir gumazir dapanim uabɨ Moses Osirizir Arazim abɨki.
